price: 51. Moko wa bango akolobaka: Ya soló, nazalaki na moninga.
arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla qāilun min'hum innī kāna lī qarīnun
